directions: Peel, core, and thinly slice the apples.  Mix the apples with the white sugar, 4 tablespoons cinnamon, and vanilla.  Add the water.  When the apples are well coated, place in the pie shell.
Combine the brown sugar with the almonds and the remaining 4 tablespoons cinnamon.  Sprinkle on top of the pie.
Bake for 25 to 30 minutes at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie
title: Hot Sweet Apple Pie
